Identification.ShortTitle: Communications Security Establishment Exclusion of Positions and Employees Approval Order
Identification.LongTitle: Order Approving the Exclusion by the Public Service Commission from the Operation of the Public Service Employment Act of Positions and Employees of the Communications Security Establishment

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Communications Security Establishment Exclusion of Positions and Employees Approval Order.

The exclusion, by the Public Service Commission, from the operation of the Public Service Employment Act, other than section 35 thereof, effective April 1, 1975, of all positions and employees of the Communications Security Establishment of the Department of National Defence, is hereby approved.
